Package com.restfb.types.send

package com.restfb.types.send
Contains all types that are necessary to interact with Facebook Send API. The Send API is part of the Facebook Messenger Platform.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IsBroadcastPayload
    Marker interface for all Payloads, that are allowed to be used in the Broadcast API, see here.
    MediaAttachment.MediaTemplateElement
     
    MenuItem
     
    MessageRecipient
    Marker interface for all MesssageRecipient implementations
